channel.title: Events on SFDevs
channel.description: Recent content in Events on SFDevs

item.title: Fundamentals of networking for web developers
item.description: We have all used the internet. Some of us might even have written code for a web site. Now letâ€™s demystify how it all works. Things to be covered: basics of networking and networking tools, how do domain names and addresses work, network structure and topology, protocols, layers, and packets Network factors affecting web reliability and performance, and the future of web networks. Carsforsale.com will be providing pizza and beverages for this meetup.

item.title: Auditing network traffic in and out of the AWS cloud!
item.description: Adam Tischler, Senior consultant at Secunetics, will be presenting on auditing traffic in and out of the AWS cloud! Special thanks to our hosts, cars for sale, and our sponsors TEKsystems! There will be pizza before the meetup and a little time for professional networking, so come hungry!

item.title: AWS re:Invent 2019: devOps highlights & end of year circle up
item.description: This will be a casual mixer event–with informal presentations on AWS re:Invent 2019 highlights. A time & place to consider the past year and the next with socializing, drinks, snacks & a landing spot for devOps folks from all quarters.
